table.0: Force of blow shivers your weapon free of your grasp. Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike and you are disarmed.
table.1: Opportunistic strike. Inflict +1d3 damage with this strike.
table.2: Foe jabbed in the eye! Ugly bruising and inflict +1d4 damage with this strike.
table.3: Stunning crack to forehead. Inflict +1d3 damage with this strike, and the foe falls to the bottom of the initiative count next round.
table.4: Strike to foe’s kneecap. Inflict +1d4 damage with this strike and the foe suffers a -10’ penalty to speed until healed.
table.5: Solid strike to torso. Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike.
table.6: Lucky strike disarms foe. You gain a free attack if the enemy stoops to retrieve his weapon.
table.7: Smash foe’s hand. Inflict +2d3 damage with this strike. You break two of the enemy’s fingers.
table.8: Numbing strike! Cursing in agony, the foe is unable to attack next round.
table.9: Smash foe’s nose. Inflict +2d4 damage with this strike and blood streams down the enemy’s face.
table.10: Foe trips on his own feet and falls prone for the remainder of the round.
table.11: Piercing strike. Inflict +2d4 damage with this strike.
table.12: Strike to groin. The foe must make a DC 15 Fort save or spend the next two rounds retching.
table.13: Blow smashes foe’s ankle; his movement speed is reduced by half.
table.14: Strike grazes temple; blood blinds the foe for 1d3 rounds.
table.15: Stab enemy’s weapon hand. The weapon is lost and knocked 1d10+5 feet away.
table.16: Narrowly avoid foe’s counterstrike! Inflict normal damage and make another attack roll. If the second attack hits, you inflict an additional +1d6 damage.
table.17: Blow to throat. Foe staggers around for 2 rounds and is unable to speak, cast spells, or attack.
table.18: Foe falls into your attack. He takes +2d6 damage from the strike and curses your luck.
table.19: Miracle strike. The foe must make a DC 20 Fort save or fall unconscious.
table.20+: Lucky blow dents foe’s skull! Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike. If the foe has no helm, he suffers a permanent loss of 1d4 Int.
